titles.title: Term Limits bill
A bill to require the Secretary of Education to waive certain regulations in considering an application submitted by the Winona R-III School District, Missouri.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S442-443)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

bill.summary: 1/21/1993--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Education to waive certain requirements for local effort in excess of $200,000 in awarding funds to the Winona R-III School District, Missouri, under Federal law relating to impact aid.
